title: Child's Jacket
description: black open front with 9 frog closures; 5 metal and fabric buttons alternating with 4 metal disks; lower front sides have abstract leaf pattern embroidered in green, purple and magenta; stand up collar with 9 metal studs; embroidered band on sleeves and fan shaped bottom, front and back; blue lining
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
